mapper.select: SELECT tb_stu.stu_id as 学号,tb_stu.stu_name as 姓名,tb_stu.age as 年龄,tb_score.chinese as 语文,tb_score.math as 数学,tb_score.english as 英语 FROM tb_stu,tb_score WHERE tb_stu.stu_id = tb_score.stu_id

SELECT tb_stu.stu_id as 学号,tb_stu.stu_name as 姓名,tb_stu.age as 年龄,tb_score.chinese as 语文,tb_score.math as 数学,tb_score.english as 英语 FROM tb_stu,tb_score WHERE tb_stu.stu_id = tb_score.stu_id ORDER BY chinese DESC

SELECT tb_stu.stu_id as 学号,tb_stu.stu_name as 姓名,tb_stu.age as 年龄,tb_score.chinese as 语文,tb_score.math as 数学,tb_score.english as 英语 FROM tb_stu,tb_score WHERE tb_stu.stu_id = tb_score.stu_id AND tb_score.chinese > 70
SELECT tb_score.stu_id as 学号,tb_score.chinese as 语文,tb_score.math as 数学,tb_score.english as 英语 FROM tb_score WHERE tb_score.stu_id = '${studentId}'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_score SET chinese = #{chinese},math = #{math},english = #{english} WHERE tb_score.stu_id = '${studentId}'
